com.procom.filefly

Class DocumentListFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.procom.filefly.DocumentListFragment

  • public class DocumentListFragment
extends Fragment
    The Fragment that establishes the user interface for the android.widget.ListView by connecting to a SQLite database in internal storage and constructing a List of Documents managed by a android.widget.BaseAdapter from the queried data.
    Since:
    2014-09-14
    Version:
    0.2a
    Author:
    Peter Piech

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The List of Documents that back the DocumentListFragment's android.widget.ListView.
      private DocumentListAdapter listadapter
      The DocumentListAdapter that is used to back the android.widget.ListView
